channel.title: [NEW][FOUNDER EVENT] RotaScape [Instant Play][WebClient][All Bosses]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/4924/rotascapebanner2.png[/img]
[url=http://www.rotascape.net]Website[/url] | [url=http://www.rotascape.net/forums]Forums[/url] | [url=http://www.rotascape.net/webclient/]Webclient[/url]
[b]FOUNDER EVENT GOING ON NOW[/b] (Read more at the bottom)
Hosted on a VPS
[b]Features[/b]
[u]Boss/Monsters[/u] Queen Black Dragon King Black Dragon Nex Kalphite Queen Barrows Godwars Bork Glacors Dagonnoth Kings Hararken boss Jad Theiving Herblore Mining Duel Arena Cooking Fishing Warrior's Guild Jadinko Lair Dragonbane armor Flamming Skull Hundreds of Pets Hundreds of Familiars Hunter Summoning Custom Items Full Godwars Corporal Beast Polypore Dungeon Grand Exchange Dungeoneering Steadfast, Ragefire, Glavien Boots
& Some of the most amazing graphics around.
[b]BETA/FOUNDER'S EVENT[/b]: Sign up in-game and on the forums and get a party hat. Party hats will no longer be obtainable (Even not to donators) after August 20th, So come register on the forums and sign up for your party hat now!
[/center]

item.title: [NEW][FOUNDER EVENT] RotaScape [Instant Play][WebClient][All Bosses]

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You’re only allowed one advertisement per server. Use your other one.

Read full topic
